translations.text: Qulnaa laa takhaf innaka antal a'laa

translations.text: Wa-alqi maa fee yamee-nika talqaf maa sana'oo; innamaa sana'oo kaidu saahir; Wa-laa yuflihus saahiru haisu ataa

translations.text: Fa-ulqiyas saharatu sujjadan qaalooo aamannaa bi-Rabbi Haaroona Wa-Moosa

translations.text: Qaaloo lan nu'siraka 'alaa maa jaaa'anaa minal baiyinaati wallazee fataranaa faqdi maaa anta qaad; innamaa taqdee haazihil hayaatad dunyaa

words.id: maka Maha Tinggi||Allah||Raja||sebenarnya||dan jangan||kamu tergesa-gesa||dengan Al-Qur'an||dari||sebelum||bahwa||diselesaikan/disempurnakan||kepadamu||mewahyukannya||dan katakanlah||ya Tuhanku||tambahkanlah kepadaku||ilmu pengetahuan
words.en: So high (above all)||(is) Allah||the King||the True||And (do) not||hasten||with the Quran||before||before||[that]||is completed||to you||its revelation||and say||My Lord||Increase me||(in) knowledge

translations.text: Fata'aalal laahul Malikul Haqq; Wa-laa ta'jal bil-Quraani min qabli aien yuqdaaa ilaika wahyuhoo Wa-qur Rabbi zidnee ilmaa

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||telah Kami janjikan/perintahkan||kepada||Adam||dari||sebelum/dahulu||maka dia lupa||dan tidak||Kami dapati||baginya/padanya||kemauan yang kuat
words.en: And verily||We made a covenant||with||Adam||before||before||but he forgot||and not||We found||in him||determination

translations.text: Wa-laqad ahidnaaa ilaaa Aadama min qablu fanasiya Wa-lam najid lahoo 'azmaa

words.id: dan ketika||Kami berkata||kepada para malaikat||bersujudlah kamu||kepada Adam||maka mereka bersujud||kecuali||iblis||ia enggan/menolak
words.en: And when||We said||to the Angels||Prostrate||to Adam||then they prostrated||except||Iblis||he refused

translations.text: Wa-iz qulnaa lilma-laaa'ikatis judoo li-Aadama fasajadooo illaaa ibleesa; abaa

words.id: maka Kami berkata||wahai adam||sesungguhnya||ini||musuh||bagimu||dan bagi isterimu||maka janganlah||ia mengeluarkan kamu berdua||dari||surga||maka kamu menjadi celaka
words.en: Then We said||O Adam!||Indeed||this||(is) an enemy||to you||and to your wife||So not||(let) him drive you both||from||Paradise||so (that) you would suffer

translations.text: Faqulnaa yaaa-Aadamu inna haazaa 'aduwwul laka Wa-lizawjika falaa yukhrijan-nakumaa minal Jannati fatashqaa

words.id: sesungguhnya||bagimu||bahwa tidak||kamu kelaparan||didalamnya||dan kamu tidak||telanjang
words.en: Indeed||for you||that not||you will be hungry||therein||and not||you will be unclothed

translations.text: innaa laka allaa tajoo'a feeha Wa-laa ta'raa

words.id: dan sesungguhnya kamu||kamu tidak||merasa dahaga||didalamnya||dan kamu tidak||kena panas matahari
words.en: And that you||not||will suffer from thirst||therein||and not||exposed to the sun's heat

translations.text: Wa-annaka laa tazma'u feehaa Wa-laa tadhaa

words.id: maka membisikkan pikiran jahat||kepadanya||syaitan||ia berkata||wahai adam||apakah/maukah||aku tunjukkan kepadamu||atas||pohon||kekal||dan kerajaan||tidak||binasa
words.en: Then whispered||to him||Shaitaan||he said||O Adam!||Shall||I direct you||to||(the) tree||(of) the Eternity||and a kingdom||not||(that will) deteriorate

translations.text: Fa-waswasa ilaihish Shaitaanu qaala yaaa-Aadamu hal adulluka 'alaa shajaratil khuldi Wa-mulkil laa yablaa

words.id: maka keduanya memakan||dari padanya||maka nampak||bagi keduanya||aurat keduanya||dan keduanya mulai berbuat||keduanya menutupi||atas keduanya||dari||daun||surga||dan durhaka||Adam||Tuhannya||maka sesatlah dia
words.en: Then they both ate||from it||so became apparent||to them||their shame||and they began||(to) fasten||on themselves||from||(the) leaves||(of) Paradise||And Adam disobeyed||And Adam disobeyed||his Lord||and erred

translations.text: Fa-akalaa minhaa fabadat lahumaa saw-aatuhumaa Wa-tafiqaa yakhsifaani alaihimaa minw waraqil jannah; Wa-'asaaa Aadamu Rabbahoo faghawaa

words.id: kemudian||memilihnya||Tuhannya||maka Dia menerima taubat||atasnya||dan Dia memberi petunjuk
words.en: Then||chose him||his Lord||and turned||to him||and guided (him)

translations.text: Summaj tabbahu Rabbuhoo fataaba alaihi Wa-hadaa

words.id: (Allah) berfirman||turunlah kamu berdua||daripadanya||semuanya/bersama-sama||sebagian kamu||bagi sebagian yang lain||musuh||maka adapun/jika||datang kepada kalian||dari pada-Ku||petunjuk||maka barangsiapa||mengikuti||petunjuk-Ku||maka dia tidak akan||tersesat||dan dia tidak||celaka
words.en: He said||Go down||from it||all||some of you||to others||(as) enemy||Then if||comes to you||from Me||guidance||then whoever||follows||My guidance||then not||he will go astray||and not||suffer

translations.text: Qaalah bita minhaa jamee'am ba'dukum liba'din 'aduww; fa-immaa ya'tiyannakum minnee hudan famanit taba'a hudaaya falaa yadillu Wa-laa yashqaa

words.id: dan barangsiapa||ia berpaling||dari||peringatan-Ku||maka sesungguhnya||baginya||penghidupan||sulit/sempit||dan Kami akan mengumpulkannya||hari||kiamat||buta
words.en: And whoever||turns away||from||My remembrance||then indeed||for him||(is) a life||straitened||and We will gather him||(on the) Day||(of) the Resurrection||blind

translations.text: Wa-man a'rada 'an Zikree fa-inna lahoo ma'eeshatan dankanw Wa-nahshuruhoo Yawmal Qiyaamati a'maa

words.id: dia berkata||ya Tuhanku||mengapa||Engkau mengumpulkan aku||buta||dan/padahal sesungguhnya||adalah aku||seorang yang melihat
words.en: He will say||My Lord!||Why||You raised me||blind||while [verily]||I had||sight

translations.text: Qaala Rabbi lima hashar-tanee a'maa Wa-qad kuntu baseeraa

words.id: (Allah) berfirman||demikianlah||telah datang kepadamu||ayat-ayat Kami||maka kamu melupakannya||dan demikian||hari ini||kamu dilupakan
words.en: He will say||Thus||came to you||Our Signs||but you forgot them||and thus||today||you will be forgotten

translations.text: Qaala kazaalika atatka Aayaatunaa fanaseetahaa Wa-kazaalikal Yawma tunsaa

words.id: dan demikianlah||Kami membalas||orang||melampaui batas||dan dia tidak||beriman||dengan/kepada ayat-ayat||Tuhannya||dan sungguh azab||akhirat||lebih/sangat keras||dan lebih kekal
words.en: And thus||We recompense||(he) who||transgresses||and not||believes||in (the) Signs||(of) his Lord||And surely (the) punishment||(of) the Hereafter||(is) more severe||and more lasting

translations.text: Wa-kazaalika najzee man asrafa Wa-lam yu'min bi-Aayaati Rabbih; Wa-la'azaabul Aakhirati ashaddu Wa-abqaa

words.id: apakah maka tidak||menjadi petunjuk||bagi mereka||berapa banyak||Kami telah membinasakan||sebelum mereka||dari||kurun/ummat-ummat||mereka berjalan||di||tempat tinggal mereka/ummat-ummat||sesungguhnya||pada||yang demikian||sungguh tanda-tanda||bagi orang yang mempunyai||pengertian/fikiran
words.en: Then has not||it guided||[for] them||how many||We (have) destroyed||before them||of||the generations||(as) they walk||in||their dwellings||Indeed||in||that||surely (are) Signs||for possessors||(of) intelligence

translations.text: Afalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknaa qablahum minal qurooni yamshoona fee masaakinihim; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil li-ulin nuhaa

words.id: dan sekiranya tidak||perkataan/ketetapan||telah lewat/terdahulu||dari||Tuhanmu||sungguh adalah||melekat/menimpa||dan ajal/waktu||yang telah ditentukan
words.en: And if not||(for) a Word||(that) preceded||from||your Lord||surely (would) have been||an obligation||and a term||determined

translations.text: Wa-law-laa Kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika lakaana lizaamanw Wa-'ajalun musammaa

words.id: maka bersabarlah kamu||atas||apa yang||mereka katakan||dan bertasbihlah||dengan memuji||Tuhanmu||sebelum||terbit||matahari||dan sebelum||terbenamnya||dan dari||bagian/waktu||malam||maka bertasbihlah||dan di ujung||siang||supaya kamu||kamu rela/senang
words.en: So be patient||over||what||they say||and glorify||with praise||(of) your Lord||before||(the) rising||(of) the sun||and before||its setting||and from||(the) hours||(of) the night||and glorify||(at the) ends||(of) the day||so that you may||be satisfied

translations.text: Fasbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona Wa-sabbih bihamdi Rabbika qabla tuloo'ish shamsi Wa-qabla ghuroobihaa Wa-min aanaaa'il laili fasabbih Wa-atraafan nahaari la-'allaka tardaa

words.id: dan jangan||kamu tujukan||kedua matamu||kepada||apa||Kami beri kesenangan||dengannya||jodoh/golongan-golongan||diantara mereka||kembang||kehidupan||dunia||untuk Kami menguji mereka||padanya/dengannya||dan/sedang rezki/karunia||Tuhanmu||lebih baik||dan lebih kekal
words.en: And (do) not||extend||your eyes||towards||what||We have given for enjoyment||[with it]||pairs||of them||(the) splendor||(of) the life||(of) the world||that We may test them||in it||And (the) provision||(of) your Lord||(is) better||and more lasting

translations.text: Wa-laa tamuddanna ainaika ilaa ma matta'na biheee azwajam minhum zahratal hayaatid dunya linaftinahum feeh; Wa-rizqu Rabbika khairunw Wa-abqaa

words.id: dan suruhlah||keluargamu/ummatmu||dengan sholat||dan berteguhlah/bersabarlah||atasnya||Kami tidak||minta kepadamu||rezeki||Kami||Kami memberi rezekimu||dan akibat||bagi orang yang bertakwa
words.en: And enjoin||(on) your family||the prayer||and be steadfast||therein||Not||We ask you||(for) provision||We||provide (for) you||and the outcome||(is) for the righteous[ness]

translations.text: Wa'mur ahlaka bis-Salaati wastabir alaihaa laa nas'aluka rizqaa; nahnu narzuquk; wal-'aaqibatu littaqwaa

words.id: dan mereka berkata||mengapa tidak||dia datang kepada kami||dengan ayat/bukti||dari||Tuhannya||ataukah tidak||datang kepada mereka||yang nyata||apa yang||dalam||kitab-kitab||pertama/dahulu
words.en: And they say||Why not||he brings us||a sign||from||his Lord||Has not||come to them||evidence||(of) what||(was) in||the Scriptures||the former

translations.text: Wa-qaaloo law-laa ya'teenaa bi-aayatin mir Rabbih; awa-lam ta'tihim baiyinatu maa fis suhufil oolaa

words.id: dan sekiranya||sesungguhnya Kami||Kami membinasakan mereka||dengan suatu azab||dari||sebelumnya||pasti mereka berkata||ya Tuhan kami||mengapa tidak||Engkau utus||kepada kami||seorang Rasul||maka kami akan mengikuti||ayat-ayat Engkau||dari||sebelum||bahwa||kami hina||dan kami bernoda/rendah
words.en: And if||We||(had) destroyed them||with a punishment||before him||before him||surely they (would) have said||Our Lord||why not||You sent||to us||a Messenger||so we (could) have followed||Your signs||before||before||[that]||we were humiliated||and disgraced

translations.text: Wa-law annaaa ahlaknaahum bi-'azaabin min qablihee laqaaloo Rabbanaa law-laaa arsalta ilainaa Rasoolan fanattabi'a Aayaatika min qabli an nazilla Wa-nakhzaa

words.id: katakanlah||masing-masing||menunggu||maka tunggulah olehmu||maka kamu akan mengetahui||orang/siapa||penghuni (mempunyai)||jalan||sama/lurus||dan siapa||mendapat petunjuk
words.en: Say||Each||(is) waiting||so await||Then you will know||who||(are the) companions||(of) the way||[the] even||and who||is guided

translations.text: Qul kullum mutarabbisun fa-tarabbasoo fa-sa-ta'lamoona man Ashaabus Siraatis Sawiyyi Wa-manih tadaa
